message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this fantastic product. I think you'll really love it! Would you like to buy it from me for $120?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I'm not sure I can go as low as $90. How about we meet in the middle at $110?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I'm still not quite there, Bob. But I'm willing to make a bit more of a concession. How about we try $105?
I'm getting closer, but I think we can do better than that. How about $98? I'm willing to meet you halfway between $95 and $105.
You're really close, Bob! But I'm not ready to give up on getting a better price. How about we try $108?
I'm not sure I can go much higher than that. How about $102? I'm trying to find a price that works for both of us.
I'm getting a bit concerned that we're not going to meet in the middle, Bob. But I'm willing to make one more concession. How about $110?
I'm not sure I can go any higher than this, but I'll try one last time. How about $99? I'm really hoping we can meet on this price.
